Importing Example Code into Android Studio

  1. Navigate to [Platform]/[build version]/demos/android-studio within your Link-OS Multiplatform SDK installation directory (where [Platform] is the desired platform and [build version] corresponds to the desired build)
  2. You can either copy the folder to your desired location or run the project directly from this directory
  3. From the Android Studio menu bar, select File > Open...
  4. Navigate to the android-studio folder
  5. Click the OK button
